archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0839
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want to be able to extract (in excel format) Customer information and usage details on all services/datasets, by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services.

properties.value: To be checked internally by VF where to get the detail including for example sms content, gps location. Those are not available at Comarch.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
